about_the_game:
This DLC includes all FEMINAZI: The Triggering Soundtracks:
  • Feminazi The Triggering - Lymphnode Police Departmant
  • Feminazi The Triggering - Frozen Yogurt
  • Feminazi The Triggering - Gymtimidation
  • Feminazi The Triggering - Morning Misogyny
  • Feminazi The Triggering - Peaceful Protest
  • Feminazi The Triggering - Safespace Serendipity
  • Feminazi The Triggering - Snowflake Shuffle
  • Feminazi The Triggering - Triggly Truffles

All soundtracks are made by Edwin Pickett

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible, at least 256MB video memory
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
